version_description: A small update to make JioPlay even better & delightful place to watch programs.
A small update to make JioPlay even better & delightful place to watch programs.
A small update with bug fixes to make JioPlay even better & delightful place to watch Live TV & catch-up TV.

- Seamless integration with Hotstar app for all STAR TV channels (Live & Catch Up programs)
- To watch STAR TV channels and programs in JioPlay, please download or upgrade your Hotstar app
- Please open JioPlay and tap on any Star TV channel logo or program name to start watching
- You can return to JioPlay by tapping ”BACK TO JIOPLAY” on top left corner in Hotstar app
- Bugs & crash fixes
- Enhancements (mute option on player)
We welcome your suggestions on AppStoreFeedback@jio.com

- App icon changed from JioPlay to JioTV
- Seamless integration with Hotstar app for all STAR TV channels (Live & Catch Up programs)
- To watch STAR TV channels and programs in JioTV, please download or upgrade your Hotstar app
- Please open JioTV and tap on any Star TV channel logo or program name to start watching
- You can return to JioTV by tapping ”BACK TO JIOTV” on top left corner in Hotstar app
- Bugs & crash fixes
- Enhancements (mute option on player)

- Bugs & crash fixes
- Performance improvement & Optimization
- Bugs & Crash fixes to make JioTV experience even better!

- New Avatar of JioTV with new & enhanced features
- Personalized EPG, shows your most watched channel on the top
- Simplified UI
- Bug Fixes & performance improvements

- New Avatar of JioTV with new & enhanced features
- Personalized EPG, shows your most watched channel on the top
- Simplified UI
- Bug Fixes & performance improvements

iOS 13 supports & bug fixes.
-Bug Fixes and performance improvements.

You asked for it & we deliver!

JioTV now offers edge-to-edge video playback on iPhoneX series smartphones.
Use the pinch gesture to fill the screen while you watch your favourite TV channels.

Just another step to give you an immersive viewing experience :)

With love,
JioTV

All new Featured, Sports & News Section with latest update on what’s playing right NOW.
We have a surprise for you, so do stick around for all the sporting action round the year starting with Australia's Tour of India (IND vs AUS, Feb-Mar 2019).
Some Bug fixes and performance upgradation.

- Design improvements to support iPhone X.
- Extermination of bugs.

--Multi-cam visualisation for cricket lovers.
--Bug fixes and performance improvements.

-Performance improvements
-Curated categories
-Instant highlights

You asked for it & we deliver!

JioTV now offers edge-to-edge video playback on iPhoneX series smartphones.
Use the pinch gesture to fill the screen while you watch your favourite TV channels.

Just another step to give you an immersive viewing experience :)

With love,

“JioTV has undergone a makeover!

Now you can discover a wide variety of programs handpicked from 600+ channels at just one glance.
Check out the all new Featured, Sports & News Section with latest update on what’s playing right NOW on JioTV.

We have a surprise for you, so do stick around for all the sporting action round the year starting with Australia's Tour of India (IND vs AUS, Feb-Mar 2019).

Just another step to give you the best TV viewing experience :)

With love,
JioTV”
